comment.author: 37576003@N07
comment._content: ...What was in the air in those days that produced this kind of product design?  .... Interesting Irving Penn'ish velvet background, though the centered seam distracts.  ....I don't really care about the quality of the image....I'm just happy that someone thought to photograph this most interesting product design.
